source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Create a perfect soy wax candle
items.headline: Candle making course on how to create an ideal candle from the first try
objectives_summary: Candle making from basics to advanced
Make a range of perfect candles at home
Create most trending soy wax scented candles

items.title: Inspired Watercolor for Beginners
items.headline: Painting a Simple Picture of Seashells in Watercolor
objectives_summary: You will reinforce several techniques you learned in the Prep Course, including painting into wet surfaces, different ways of blending, painting fine lines and creating textures.

items.title: Dynamic floral illustration in watercolours and ink
items.headline: watercolour and ink illustration
objectives_summary: Step by step instructions on how to paint floral watercolour patterns
Dynamic floral illustration that stands out with a characteristic  line and wash technique!
Gain control of brushes to create petal and leaf shapes in a single stroke.

items.title: Introduction to Botanical Art - Acacia, or Golden Wattle
items.headline: Suitable for beginner or intermediate artists, you will learn to paint a botanical watercolour of an Acacia, or Wattle.
objectives_summary: How to paint a botanical watercolour painting
How to paint fluffy yellow Acacia flowers and Acacia leaves in watercolour
The basic equipment for botanical watercolour painting

items.title: How to Market Jewelry at Craft Shows
items.headline: Marketing and visual merchandising techniques used at the finest stores that can be incorporated into your booth.
objectives_summary: Visually merchandise your craft booth
Make your craft booth more inviting using all 5 senses
Learn the benefits of choosing the right show

items.title: Learn How to Draw the Face for Beginners by simple Steps
items.headline: This is The Ultimate Drawing Course; You will learn to Draw the faces like a pro by the simplest way possible [FULL HD]
objectives_summary: Draw eyes, nose, hair, lips, etc that look pretty
Use a simple formula for always drawing a pretty face
Use simple tools for professional drawing

items.title: Paint colorful SUNFLOWERS in a quick, WET into WET & bold.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Explore painting quickly with bold brush strokes with this very wet & loose painting. It's easy, relax and have fun.
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint wet into wet with watercolours.
Learn how easy it can be to paint with out drawing first.
Learn how different the same subject can look when being treated in different ways.

items.title: Paint Castle Combe in Watercolor | Learn Watercolor Skills
items.headline: Learn a new approach to Watercolour. Get amazing detail and impressionism with Colin Bradley. A picture after AR Quinton
objectives_summary: Have a completed a Painting of AR Castle Combe Picture
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
Understand building colours and layers with watercolor

items.title: Draw a Realistic Pencil Portrait from a Photograph
items.headline: Improve Your Drawing Skills with These Tips from a Portrait Artist
objectives_summary: Draw a realistic portrait with pencils
Choosing the right pencils
Create contrast in your drawings

items.title: Beginners Guide to Resin Ocean Waves

visible_instructors.title: Karim Aboud
visible_instructors.name: Karim
visible_instructors.job_title: Full Time Artist / Resin Instructor / Kidz Art Instructor

items.headline: Step by Step Guide to creating your first Resin Ocean Scape!
objectives_summary: Beginners Resin- How to Make Resin Ocean Waves
Mixing and Adding Color to Resin
Pouring Resin

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 4: Drawing the Full Figure (P2)
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw the garments of Bishops, Priests and Deacons in various frontal stances

items.title: Beginners Paper Quilling
items.headline: Creative and Relaxing art form with clear step by step instructions
objectives_summary: Get introduced to the tools required to do paper quilling
Learn to roll and make different shapes using paper strips
Ideas to create beautiful quilling projects with clear step by step instructions

items.title: Drawing Fundamentals 4: Dynamic Shading on Toned Paper
items.headline: Shading Techniques to Take Your Drawing to the Next Level!
objectives_summary: How to apply atmospheric perspective to add depths to your drawings
How to use cross-hatching to make your shading more exciting
How to design backgrounds that will make your subject leap from the page

items.title: Mixed Media From The Heart
items.headline: When I paint, I paint from the heart. Learn my creative process so yo too can pour  your emotions and dreams into art.
objectives_summary: Have a better understandig of my creative process, and how you too can use your emotions and experiences to create beautiful art.
Have an art journal to keep ideas from going away whne you have them.
Release your emotional richness into your personal art.

items.title: Simple Watercolor Landscapes; Paint Loose Monochrome Art

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Learn tips and tricks for paint expressive monochromatic watercolor landscapes & how to avoid rigid, tight art.
objectives_summary: You will learn to paint simple monochromatic watercolor landscape paintings.
You will learn to paint loose and expressive watercolor landscapes.
You will learn wet-in-wet techniques.

items.title: Wooden Spoon Carving

visible_instructors.title: Art School Online
visible_instructors.name: Art
visible_instructors.job_title: Online Education For Become a Better Artist

items.headline: Make a Wooden Spoon for everyone without any background knowledge
objectives_summary: The easiest way to create and craft beautiful wood carving .
In this course we will teach you to step by step tutorials with full details .
Learn how to use carving tools
